channel.title: dbview on Steve Borcherding
channel.description: Recent content in dbview on Steve Borcherding

item.title: dbView - Overview
item.description: Overview dbView is a query and analysis tool that is intended provide a consistent environment in which to work with different types of databases. I created and maintain dbView to support my day-to-day work and for this reason dbView is continually evolving and changing as my needs change. Please see me with any questions and/or for an overview of dbView capabilities. Thanks, Steve Borcherding SQLite database library I rely heavily on SQLite (SQLite Home Page) as a versatile database engine for much of the underpinnings of dbView and my related data-related tools.

item.title: dbView - Import Delimited Text to SQlite
item.description: Importing a delimited text file into a SQLite database Open a SQLite database and run the following import command (replace example parameter values with your own values) import src_type = 'text_delimited' src_file = 'REPLACE_ME_source_text_file' src_file_field_separator = 'tab' src_file_text_qualifier = 'none' src_file_header_rows = 1 src_file_max_rows = 10 src_file_field_list = 'field1:int' ,'field2:varchar(50)' ,'field3:datetime' src_file_field_load_list = 'field1' ,'field3' src_file_null_text = 'NULL' src_file_trim_char_values = 'true' src_datetime_format = 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff' src_file_ignore_empty_lines = 'true' src_file_ignore_lines_matching = '^\(\d+ row\(s\) affected\)$' src_file_ignore_ssms_sql_block = 'true' tgt_table = 'REPLACE_ME_target_table_name' tgt_exists_action = 'fail' ; parameters type required description/notes src_type string required set to 'text_delimited' src_file string required fully pathed name of the delimited file to read src_file_text_qualifier string optional the character used to specify where a text value begins and ends.
